title: Maitland Maternity Christmas
description: As Hugh Blake gets ready to become a stepfather to the Maitland clan, he desperately wants his own children--Suzanne, a work-obsessed CEO; Thomas, a lawyer whose relationship with the woman he loves is disintegrating; and Diane, a teacher who is devoted to her students--to find romance and happiness, and with a little holiday magic, all of them will discover the power of love. Original.
author: Judy Christenberry
